General.Name: Qingdao Daneng Environmental Protection Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao Daneng Environmental Protection Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and supply of various technologies for coal-fired power plants in China. It provides slag energy saving and environmental protection treatment systems, such as dry slag and wet slag treatment systems, pneumatic conveying systems, and CFB slag systems, as well as flue gas energy saving and environmental protection treatment systems, such as flue gas coolers and reheaters. It also offers clean energy consumption systems, such as electrode boiler and regenerative tank, and load denitrification. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Qingdao, China.
